name: Mercury and Argus
maker: Produced in the Doccia Porcelain Factory, After models by Giovanni Battista Foggini, Probably made by Gaspero Bruschi
description: Mercury and Argus; Produced in the Doccia Porcelain Factory (Italian, about 1735 - 1896), After models by Giovanni Battista Foggini (Italian, 1652 - 1725), Probably made by Gaspero Bruschi (Italian, 1701 - 1780); Doccia (outside Florence), Italy; about 1750; Hard-paste porcelain, polychrome enamel decoration, gilding; 45.1 x 33 x 28 cm (17 3/4 x 13 x 11 in.); 94.SE.76.1; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Mercury and Argus
medium: Hard-paste porcelain, polychrome enamel decoration, gilding
